definition: a series of acts at a night club
details:
noun
- a series of acts at a night club
= synonyms: floorshow, floor show
- a spot that is open late at night and that provides entertainment (as singers or dancers) as well as dancing and food and drink
= example: a spot that is open late at night and that provides entertainment (as singers or dancers) as well as dancing and food and drink
= synonyms: nightclub, night club, club, nightspot
